raw: {"overallRiskLevel": "high", "summary": "The contract draft is critically incomplete, with 12 high-severity failures indicating missing mandatory fields including signing date, contract number, buyer name, delivery details, bank account, warranty period, and acceptance timeframe. Two medium-severity warnings flag missing table headers and unverified product/price data. Two manual-review items require human validation of completeness and legal entity naming conventions. The document is not executable in its current state.", "keyFindings": [{"title": "Critical Missing Contract Metadata", "detail": "Signing date, contract number, and buyer name are entirely blank — violating foundational contract validity requirements under PRC Contract Law Article 12.", "evidenceIds": ["field.afcab702", "field.28ba2c87", "field.1f6e7db9"]}, {"title": "Incomplete Delivery Terms", "detail": "Delivery location, date, transport method, and end-user fields are all empty, creating material ambiguity on performance obligations and risk transfer (INCOTERMS/PRC Civil Code Art. 598).", "evidenceIds": ["field.de8a4b95", "field.e40edd68", "field.d74e5fca", "field.31b8c1a0"]}, {"title": "Unenforceable Payment Terms", "detail": "Bank account details and 'other' payment clauses are blank; without valid payee information, payment obligations cannot be legally discharged.", "evidenceIds": ["field.9d55e1ea", "field.7878bc72"]}, {"title": "Undefined Acceptance & Warranty Timelines", "detail": "Acceptance period (Art. 4) and warranty duration (Art. 9) are unfilled, exposing both parties to indefinite liability and dispute risk.", "evidenceIds": ["field.b1805df6", "field.1d21defd"]}], "improvementSuggestions": [{"title": "Mandatory Field Completion Protocol", "detail": "Implement a pre-signature checklist requiring completion of all 15 high-severity fields (signing date, contract number, buyer/seller names, delivery terms, bank details, acceptance/warranty periods) before internal review.", "priority": "critical"}, {"title": "Table Structure Enforcement", "detail": "Require tabular product specifications with mandatory headers (product name, quantity, unit price, total amount, tax, grand total) and cross-verify arithmetic consistency and Chinese/Arabic numeral alignment.", "priority": "high"}, {"title": "Legal Entity Validation Rule", "detail": "Automate validation that 'Buyer' field contains full registered name ending in '有限公司' or '股份有限公司', per PRC Company Registration Regulations.", "priority": "medium"}], "missingInformation": ["Product specifications table (name, quantity, unit price, total amount)", "Tax treatment (VAT rate, invoice type)", "Governing law and dispute resolution clause", "Signatory authority statements (e.g., 'authorized representative')", "Digital signature or seal placement instructions"], "confidence": 0.97}
